README.rst:
arxiv-wrapper |travis| |coveralls|
==================================

.. |travis| image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/JP-Ellis/arxiv-wrapper.svg
            :target: https://travis-ci.org/JP-Ellis/arxiv-wrapper
.. |coveralls| image:: https://img.shields.io/coveralls/JP-Ellis/arxiv-wrapper.svg
            :target: https://coveralls.io/github/JP-Ellis/arxiv-wrapper

A wrapper for the arXiv API.

This is a fairly simple wrapper and at this stage it has no official
documentation.  Most functions names should be quite self-explanatory, and any
special note are listed in the function docstring.  Have a look at the tests for
good example of the wrapper being used.

Requirements
------------

-  feedparser ``>=5``
-  requests ``>=2``

Installation
------------

1. Download it from Github with ``pip install git+git://github.com/JP-Ellis/arxiv-wrapper``

Contributing
------------

If you have any suggestions or have found a bug, feel free to open a new issue
or pull request here on Github.
